card.name: Master of Waves
card.property: Protection from red Elemental creatures you control get +1/+1. When Master of Waves enters the battlefield, create a number of 1/0 blue Elemental creature tokens equal to your devotion to blue. (Each {U} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to blue.)

card.name: Aquitect's Will
card.property: Put a flood counter on target land. That land is an Island in addition to its other types for as long as it has a flood counter on it. If you control a Merfolk, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You may want to hold your breath."–Kellyg, merrow aquitect

card.name: Claustrophobia
card.property: Enchant creature When Claustrophobia enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature. Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

card.name: Concentrate
card.property: Draw three cards.

card.name: Engulf the Shore
card.property: Return to their owners' hands all creatures with toughness less than or equal to the number of Islands you control.

card.name: Essence Scatter
card.property: Counter target creature spell.

card.name: Harbinger of the Tides
card.property: You may cast Harbinger of the Tides as though it had flash if you pay {2} more to cast it. (You may cast it any time you could cast an instant.) When Harbinger of the Tides enters the battlefield, you may return target tapped creature an opponent controls to its owner's hand.

card.name: Inkfathom Divers
card.property: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.) When Inkfathom Divers enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library, then put them back in any order.

card.name: Master of the Pearl Trident
card.property: Other Merfolk creatures you control get +1/+1 and have islandwalk. (They can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)

card.name: Merfolk Looter
card.property: {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

card.name: Merfolk Sovereign
card.property: Other Merfolk creatures you control get +1/+1. {T}: Target Merfolk creature can't be blocked this turn.

card.name: Merfolk Wayfinder
card.property: Flying When Merfolk Wayfinder enters the battlefield, reveal the top three cards of your library. Put all Island cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Merrow Reejerey
card.property: Other Merfolk creatures you control get +1/+1. Whenever you cast a Merfolk spell, you may tap or untap target permanent.

card.name: Mind Spring
card.property: Draw X cards.

card.name: Misdirection
card.property: You may exile a blue card from your hand rather than pay Misdirection's mana cost. Change the target of target spell with a single target.

card.name: Rootwater Hunter
card.property: {T}: Rootwater Hunter deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Scroll Thief
card.property: Whenever Scroll Thief deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.

card.name: Streambed Aquitects
card.property: {T}: Target Merfolk creature gets +1/+1 and gains islandwalk until end of turn. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.) {T}: Target land becomes an Island until end of turn.

card.name: Tidal Courier
card.property: When Tidal Courier enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Merfolk cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. {3}{U}: Tidal Courier gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Tidal Warrior
card.property: {T}: Target land becomes an Island until end of turn.

card.name: Tidal Wave
card.property: Create a 5/5 blue Wall creature token with defender. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Tidebinder Mage
card.property: When Tidebinder Mage enters the battlefield, tap target red or green creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step for as long as you control Tidebinder Mage.

card.name: Triton Tactics
card.property: Up to two target creatures each get +0/+3 until end of turn. Untap those creatures. At this turn's next end of combat, tap each creature that was blocked by one of those creatures this turn and it doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

card.name: Wake Thrasher
card.property: Whenever a permanent you control becomes untapped, Wake Thrasher gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Cold-Eyed Selkie
card.property: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.) Whenever Cold-Eyed Selkie deals combat damage to a player, you may draw that many cards.

card.name: Blighted Cataract
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {5}{U}, {T}, Sacrifice Blighted Cataract: Draw two cards.

card.name: Lonely Sandbar
card.property: Lonely Sandbar enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U} to your mana pool. Cycling {U} ({U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Island
card.property: ({T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Island
card.property: ({T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Island
card.property: ({T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Island
card.property: ({T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Warren Instigator
card.property: Double strike Whenever Warren Instigator deals damage to an opponent, you may put a Goblin creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: Battle Squadron
card.property: Flying Battle Squadron's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control.

card.name: Boggart Brute
card.property: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

card.name: Brute Strength
card.property: Target creature gets +3/+1 and gains trample until end of turn.

card.name: Cleaver Riot
card.property: Creatures you control gain double strike until end of turn. (They deal both first-strike and regular combat damage.)

card.name: Ember Hauler
card.property: {1}, Sacrifice Ember Hauler: Ember Hauler deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Foundry Street Denizen
card.property: Whenever another red creature enters the battlefield under your control, Foundry Street Denizen gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Gempalm Incinerator
card.property: Cycling {1}{R} ({1}{R}, Discard this card: Draw a card.) When you cycle Gempalm Incinerator, you may have it deal X damage to target creature, where X is the number of Goblins on the battlefield.

card.name: Ghostfire
card.property: Ghostfire is colorless. Ghostfire deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Goblin Chieftain
card.property: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.) Other Goblin creatures you control get +1/+1 and have haste.

card.name: Goblin Diplomats
card.property: {T}: Each creature attacks this turn if able.

card.name: Goblin Glory Chaser
card.property: Renown 1 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes renowned.) As long as Goblin Glory Chaser is renowned, it has menace. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

card.name: Goblin Goon
card.property: Goblin Goon can't attack unless you control more creatures than defending player. Goblin Goon can't block unless you control more creatures than attacking player.

card.name: Goblin Grenade
card.property: As an additional cost to cast Goblin Grenade, sacrifice a Goblin. Goblin Grenade deals 5 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Goblin Rabblemaster
card.property: Other Goblin creatures you control attack each combat if able. At the beginning of combat on your turn, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token with haste. Whenever Goblin Rabblemaster attacks, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each other attacking Goblin.

card.name: Goblin Razerunners
Goblin Ringleader
card.property: Haste When Goblin Ringleader enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Goblin cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Goblin Tunneler
card.property: {T}: Target creature with power 2 or less can't be blocked this turn.

card.name: Goblin Wardriver
card.property: Battle cry (Whenever this creature attacks, each other attacking creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.)

card.name: Hordeling Outburst
card.property: Create three 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.

card.name: Krenko, Mob Boss
card.property: {T}: Create X 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens, where X is the number of Goblins you control.

card.name: Krenko's Command
card.property: Create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.

card.name: Relentless Assault
card.property: Untap all creatures that attacked this turn. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase.

card.name: Tarfire
card.property: Tarfire deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Brittle Effigy
card.property: {4}, {T}, Exile Brittle Effigy: Exile target creature.

card.name: Goblin Charbelcher
card.property: {3}, {T}: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a land card. Goblin Charbelcher deals damage equal to the number of nonland cards revealed this way to target creature or player. If the revealed land card was a Mountain, Goblin Charbelcher deals double that damage instead. Put the revealed cards on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Blighted Gorge
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {4}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Blighted Gorge: Blighted Gorge deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Forgotten Cave
card.property: Forgotten Cave enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} to your mana pool. Cycling {R} ({R}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Mountain
card.property: ({T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.)

card.property: ({T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.)

card.property: ({T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.)

card.property: ({T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.)
